Ammo

0645-0715 Movement to Demo 1

1000-1140 1/L #7-11
1140-1320 2/L #12-16
1320-1400 HQ #17-18
1400 Conclude training, clean dunnage, ammo pickup
1430 RTB
1500 Closeout formation
